chunk:
Paul Mitchell MarulaOil Rare Oil Style Perfecting Serum

Brand: Paul Mitchell

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Isododecane, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Phenyl Trimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin
book: 2020-Paul Mitchell MarulaOil Rare Oil Style Perfecting Serum

chunk:
Directions: Rub 2-3 drops of oil into palms and run fingers through clean, damp hair, starting at the ends, to smooth, control, protect, hydrate and seal split ends. Massage a few drops into skin for added hydration.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 2020-Paul Mitchell MarulaOil Rare Oil Style Perfecting Serum
